ModMetaData.name: Primum Balance
ModMetaData.author: Nooberthetuber
ModMetaData.description: Provides largely mathematical fixes to a number of things in rimworld including: Surgery success chances In vanilla, surgery success hard caps at 95%. In PB, surgery success keeps on going up. Product quality In vanilla, product quality (eg. from construction, crafting, or art) is determined by: relevent skill and modifiers to quality, such as production specialists or inspiration. In PB, quality is generally decreased so that good and excellent items are significantly less common. Further, acheiving a masterwork or legendary result requires artistic skill as well.
